scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Aurora Dimitre
scrape.text: You know, as this ends, I'm still not 100% sure what was going on with it 100% of the time, but I really, really liked it. It was pretty much compulsively readable, the writing style was sparse but very interesting, the constancy of the unreliablity of the narrator was interesting--I really liked it. A weird one for sure.
